page.title: 01Summary of a rural area
page.content:
This block is a lightly populated rural area of the County of Warwickshire.It is situated south of Birmingham just N.W. of the town of Warwick.
The area is surrounded by expanding conurbations. It is essentially still a farming area but is also considered a very desireable place to live. Commu- ters are prepared to pay much higher prices to escape nearby town congestion
This block contains information on the mixing of:farmers viz commuters; original buildings viz modern expensive houses; and farming locally viz driving to work.
There is also general information on exactly what it is like to live here in July 1985-from strawberry picking to driving BMW'S!
